name: Output Saver
description: Save workflow execution results to a file
documentation: Saves the output data from previous workflow nodes to a file in various formats (JSON, CSV, TXT). Supports customizable file naming and formatting options.

inputs.label: Data to Save
inputs.description: Input data to be saved (accepts any format)

outputs.label: Saved File Info
outputs.description: Information about the saved file (path, size, format)

parameters.label: File Name
parameters.description: Name of the output file (without extension)

parameters.label: Output Format
parameters.description: Format for saving the output data

parameters.label: Output Directory
parameters.description: Directory path where file will be saved (relative to workflow execution directory)

parameters.label: Overwrite Existing
parameters.description: Overwrite file if it already exists (otherwise creates new with increment)

parameters.label: Pretty Print (JSON)
parameters.description: Format JSON output with indentation for readability (only applies to JSON format)

parameters.label: CSV Delimiter
parameters.description: Delimiter for CSV format (only applies to CSV output)

parameters.label: Include CSV Headers
parameters.description: Include column headers in CSV output
